song.full_title: Right Side of My Brain by The-Dream
song.title: Right Side of My Brain
song.lyrics:
Right Side of My Brain Lyrics[Intro The Dream & Woman's voice]
Ugh, fell in love
With a real heartbreaker
I'm so sorry
And there's nothing I can do
To shake her
Oh, oh
Yah, yah, yah, yah, yah
It's not you; it's me
Oh, oh
Yah, yah, yah, yah, yah
Breaker
I still love you
Oh, oh
Yah, yah, yah, yah, yah
Can't shake her
Yah, ah

You touch me, baby
Then you untouch me, baby
You feed me your lies
Words like pie
You want me, baby
Then you unwant me, baby
Outsmart me, baby
Now, I'm all crazy

[Bridge]
But I should be ashamed, 'cause I
Let you do me this way, and it's
Unfortunate that when you're in love
You never use
